text: The country calling code for Albania is +355 For domestic calls (within Albania), 0 must be dialed before the area code. The prefix for international calls from Albania is 00 (for example for an United States number 00 1 ... should be dialed). Below is an explanation when dialing a Tirana number: *Dial 2xxx xxx (from within Tirana) *Dial 04 2xxx xxx (from within Albania) *Dial +355 4 2xxx xxx (from outside Albania) ==History== Albania has the lowest rate of telephone use in Europe. In 2008 there were about 10 lines per 100 people. Cellular phone use is very common throughout the country. ==Numbering plan by Municipality (effective 15 September 2008)== This is a list of area codes in Albania.
